summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2626, for the improvement of 20th Avenue Northeast, and the same produced, from East 48th Street to the southerly margin of University Place Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage, and by the construction of the necessary bridges, and doing such other work as may be necessary in connection therewith, under Ordinance No. 30734 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
